channel.title: CVE Feed for TianoCore -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TianoCore -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-38578|2024-08-06T00:55:57.322Z -- tianocore -- edk%20ii
item.description: Existing CommBuffer checks in SmmEntryPoint will not catch underflow when computing BufferSize.

item.title: CVE-2024-1298|2024-05-30T20:46:21.627Z -- tianocore -- edk2
item.description: EDK2 contains a vulnerability when S3 sleep is activated where an Attacker may cause a Division-By-Zero due to a UNIT32 overflow via local access. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a loss of Availability.

item.title: CVE-2024-1298|2024-08-01T18:33:25.573Z -- tianocore -- edk2
item.description: EDK2 contains a vulnerability when S3 sleep is activated where an Attacker may cause a Division-By-Zero due to a UNIT32 overflow via local access. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a loss of Availability.
